```{r}
library(ggplot2)
tcgproject <-read.csv("USA Births.csv",encoding="UTF-8")
print(tcgproject)

ggplot(tcgproject,aes(year,births))+geom_point(shape=1)+geom_smooth(method=lm)

data(Project)
fit1 <- lm(year~births,data=tcgproject)
summary(fit1)

plot(year~births, data=tcgproject)

abline(fit1)

```
